name: Inane Fear
description:
Inane fear is a horror experience that was made for a University Assignment. It is an exaggeration of the experience of getting separated from your parents as a very young child, and the terrifying feeling that comes along with that.

Features:

  • Run around a hauntingly familiar scenery
  • Escape the twisted creatures
  • Search for your parents who you have been seperated from

This was a solo project done by only myself.
